questions.question: Confirm the Equipment with below provided image
, upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
confirm is there any physical Damage of the Equipment.
prepare the Incident / Damage and Missing Report.
connect the equipment to the mains and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC voltage of 230

videos.src: assets/videos/cautery force fx8cs/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE WALL OUTLET

questions.question: shift the Equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is provided
check the power cord continuity as shown in the video and confirm whether the power cord is defective.

videos.src: assets/videos/cautery force fx8cs/VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE.mp4
videos.videoName: VIDEO REQUIRED FOR CHECKING THE POWER CORD CABLE

questions.question: then replace the power cord with the new one
check and confirm whether the AC fuses are burnt / Blown
replace the AC fuses with the new one
check and confirm whether the ON/OFF switch is defective.
, replace the ON or OFF switch with a new one
, open the equipment as shown in the video, check and confirm whether there is a SMPS output voltage.
replace the SMPS Board with a new one
, replace the Power board or RF Board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the RF or Power Board

questions.question: confirm whether there is a RF Output in Cut or Coagulation mode.
check the foot switch cable continuity and confirm whether it is defective.
replace the foot switch Cable with a new one
check and confirm whether the foot switch is defective

videos.videoName: Video for checking foot switch continuity

questions.question: replace the foot switch with a new one
cross check the cautery pencil with another and confirm whether it is defective
replace the cautery pencil with new one
repair or replace the Foot switch control Board

videos.videoName: Video for replacing Foot switch control Board

questions.question: confirm whether the display is blank when the equipment is Power ON
check and confirm for any loose connection or breakage of cable from display to control board.
replace or reseat the cable accordingly
repair or replace the display board with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the Display Board

questions.question: repair or replace the control board accordingly
check and confirm whether the earth pad alarm / Beep appears when connected
check the connecting points for any carbon / debris formation or loose connection.
clean the connecting point and connect the earth pad back
cross check the earth pad with another and confirm whether it is defective
replace the earth pad with a new one
repair or replace the power board or RF Board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the RF or Power Board

questions.question: , check and confirm whether the buttons do not respond while setting the appropriate value in Cut or Coagulation Mode.
open the equipment as shown in the video and replace the key pad assemble
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
